description:
These long and narrow float bags are sized to slide easily into the stern on either side of your kayak’s centre support pillar.

  • Made of 10-gauge urethane fabric that won't leak or delaminate
  • To ensure floodable spaces are completely filled, measure your boat’s compartments and use a bag that is slightly larger
  • Inflated dimensions are 85 x 33 (top) x 7.6cm (bottom) or 33½ x 13 x 3in
  • Sold in pairs
name: NRS Kayak Split Stern Flotation Bags
